#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
char a[500]={'\0'};
int main()
{ long long int i,j,x,l,ans=0;
  scanf("%lld",&x);
  i=0;
  while(x>0)
  { a[i]=((x%2)+'0');
    x=x/2;
    i=i+1;
  }
  l=strlen(a);
  for(i=0;i<(l/2);i=i+1)
  { a[i]=((a[i]+a[l-1-i])-(a[l-1-i]=a[i]));}
  for(i=0;i<=(l/2);i=i+2)
  { a[i]=((a[i]+a[i+1])-(a[i+1]=a[i]));}
  for(i=(l-1),j=0;i>=0;i=i-1,j=j+1)
  { ans=ans+((a[i]-'0')*pow(2,j));
  }
  printf("%lld\n",ans);
 return 0;
}
